name: part_011
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日2023 】3D LIVE✨毎日誰かの誕生日！重大発表あり！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ ホロライブ 】 [Y_n8tWcMFj8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene talks to the audience after a performance, asking for feedback and preparing for the next song while reviewing choreography.

subtitles.original: …の、雪解(ゆきとき)でした！
subtitles.english: ...That was Yukitoki!

subtitles.original: みんな、どう？ 雪解は初挑戦なんですけど…
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone? It's my first time trying Yukitoki...

subtitles.original: 良い感じ？
subtitles.english: Was it good?

subtitles.original: ちょっとこれ以外の… 文字のコメントが欲しい！
subtitles.english: I want some... text comments besides these!

subtitles.original: 最高？ やったぁ！ よかった！
subtitles.english: The best? Yay! Thank goodness!

subtitles.original: えー、やったぜ！ ナイスだね！
subtitles.english: Heh, I did it! Nice!

subtitles.original: あ、最高すぎた、よかった！
subtitles.english: Ah, it was too good, I'm glad!

subtitles.original: 『春を待つ木』が好きだからね
subtitles.english: Because I like "The Tree Waiting for Spring"...

subtitles.original: その、なんか、逆のバージョンっていうか
subtitles.english: ...so I wanted to try the "opposite" version of it.

subtitles.original: そっちもいいなと思ってやってみたいと思ってました
subtitles.english: I thought that'd be nice too, so I wanted to try it.

subtitles.original: さあ、次はですね、あれをやっていきたいと思います
subtitles.english: Now then, next, I'd like to do that.

subtitles.original: さっきのね、これね、ねねの記憶力が試されるんですけど
subtitles.english: For this one, Nene's memory will be tested...

subtitles.original: みんなも覚えてる？ ねねが間違ってるかどうか
subtitles.english: Do you all remember too? Whether you can tell...

subtitles.original: 判断できるのは、みんなの記憶次第だからね！
subtitles.english: ...if Nene makes a mistake depends on your memory!

subtitles.original: というわけで… ちょっと待ってよ、えーっと…
subtitles.english: So... wait a second, let's see...

subtitles.original: ここ何だっけ？ ちょっと内田広由紀先生…
subtitles.english: What was this part again? Wait, Uchida Hiroyuki-sensei...

subtitles.original: こうで、ふわふわして…
subtitles.english: It's like this, then fluffy...

subtitles.original: ふんふん、回って…
subtitles.english: Mm-hmm, and then spin...

subtitles.original: あ、はいはい、オッケーオッケー
subtitles.english: Ah, right right, okay okay.

subtitles.original: うん、多分オッケー！
subtitles.english: Yeah, probably okay!

subtitles.original: よし、ほな、やってみましょうか！
subtitles.english: Alright, then let's give it a try!

subtitles.original: えー、いきます！ Love Destiny！
subtitles.english: Here we go! Love Destiny!

subtitles.original: Love Destiny / 作詞・作曲：伊藤千帆
subtitles.english: Love Destiny / Lyrics & Composition: Chiho Ito

subtitles.original: アイタイ Love Love Love Loveのに
subtitles.english: I want to see you, love love love love, and yet...

subtitles.original: アエナイ Love Love Love 今夜は
subtitles.english: I can't see you, love love love, tonight...

subtitles.original: 窓を打つ雨より
subtitles.english: More than the rain hitting the window,

subtitles.original: 激しい嵐に揺れてる
subtitles.english: I'm shaking in a violent storm.

subtitles.original: アエナイ Love Love Love Loveから
subtitles.english: Because I can't see you, love love love love,

subtitles.original: もっと Love Love Love 募るよ
subtitles.english: The love grows even more.

subtitles.original: 燃え尽きてもいい
subtitles.english: I don't mind burning out,

subtitles.original: これが最後の
subtitles.english: Because this is the final...

subtitles.original: これが最後の真実
subtitles.english: ...this is the final truth.

subtitles.original: 初めての出会いは 平凡だったけど
subtitles.english: Our first encounter was ordinary, but...

subtitles.original: 会う度に 過去の誰よりも惹かれてく
subtitles.english: Every time we meet, I'm drawn to you more than anyone.

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちの訳 うまく言えないけど
subtitles.english: I can't put the reason for these feelings into words...

subtitles.original: 運命の恋と 人は呼ぶのでしょう
subtitles.english: ...but I suppose people would call it a "fated love."

subtitles.original: ひとみ閉じたら ふたりになれる
subtitles.english: If I close my eyes, we can be together.

subtitles.original: 今たとえ この部屋ひとりでも
subtitles.english: Even if I'm alone in this room right now,

subtitles.original: It's my only destiny...
subtitles.english: It's my only destiny...

subtitles.original: アイタイ Love Love Love Loveのに
subtitles.english: I want to see you, love love love love, and yet...

subtitles.original: アエナイ Love Love Love 今夜は
subtitles.english: I can't see you, love love love, tonight...

subtitles.original: 勝手に溢れてく 激情を止められない
subtitles.english: I can't stop the passion that's overflowing.

subtitles.original: だから Love Love Love アイタイ
subtitles.english: That's why I want to see you, love love love...

subtitles.original: だけど Love Love Love アエナイ
subtitles.english: ...but I can't see you, love love love.

subtitles.original: もう戻れはしない
subtitles.english: There's no turning back now,

subtitles.original: これが最後の
subtitles.english: Because this is the final...

subtitles.original: これが最後の真実
subtitles.english: ...this is the final truth.

subtitles.original: 誰かを思うとき 苦しくなるなんてね
subtitles.english: To think that loving someone would be so painful...

subtitles.original: これまでの自分が 次々に崩れてく
subtitles.english: The "me" from before is crumbling away.

subtitles.original: ポーズとは裏腹 巻き込まれてゆく感じ
subtitles.english: Contrary to my pose, I'm being swept away...

subtitles.original: 見えない力で 引き寄せられてゆく
subtitles.english: ...being pulled in by an invisible force.

subtitles.original: ひとみそらさず ふたりになれた
subtitles.english: Without averting our eyes, we became one.

subtitles.original: あの夜の 鼓動忘れられない
subtitles.english: I can't forget the heartbeat of that night.

subtitles.original: It's my last destiny...
subtitles.english: It's my last destiny...

subtitles.original: アイタイ Love Love Love Loveのに
subtitles.english: I want to see you, love love love love, and yet...

subtitles.original: アエナイ Love Love Love 今夜は
subtitles.english: I can't see you, love love love, tonight...

subtitles.original: 窓を打つ雨より 激しい嵐に揺れてる
subtitles.english: I'm shaking in a storm more violent than rain.

subtitles.original: アエナイ Love Love Love Loveから
subtitles.english: Because I can't see you, love love love love,

subtitles.original: もっと Love Love Love 募るよ
subtitles.english: The love grows even more.

subtitles.original: 燃え尽きてもいい
subtitles.english: I don't mind burning out,

subtitles.original: これが最後の
subtitles.english: Because this is the final...

subtitles.original: これが最後の真実
subtitles.english: ...this is the final truth.

subtitles.original: ねえ 不思議 彼を想って泣ける
subtitles.english: It's strange, I can cry just thinking about him.

subtitles.original: 夜があるなんて まるで Love song
subtitles.english: That such a night exists... it's just like a love song.
